title: Canyonlands National Park: Ranger-led Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger-led Programs              Ranger-led Programs        An evening program at Squaw Flat Campground in The Needles NPS/Kirsten Kearse   Â   Learn more about the natural and cultural resources at Canyonlands National Park. Join a ranger for a talk, hike, or evening program. Program Schedule  Island in the Sky Daily program schedule beginning April 24, 2016:    Patio Talk Island in the Sky Visitor Center Topics vary. Bring water.  10:30 am Daily   Geology Talk Grand View Point Bring water, sunscreen, and a hat.  10:30 am and 11:30 am Daily   Table of Wonder Island in the Sky Visitor Center Learn about Canyonlands at our "Table of Wonder." Stop by any time, and stay as long as you like.  2:30 pm - 4 pm Daily   Special Events Rangers may offer stargazing programs and other events. Check the calendar for details. Calendar      The Needles Program schedule beginning April 15, 2016:    Evening Program Squaw Flat Campground Amphitheater Topics vary. Bring water. Check at the visitor center or campground for specific times and topics. Programs resume in September   Special Events Rangers may offer stargazing programs and other events. Check the calendar for details. Calendar      The Maze The Maze District offers guided hikes in Horseshoe Canyon most weekends during spring and fall.     All program schedules are subject to change. Schedules and times vary, so please check locally at visitor centers and campground bulletin boards for current listings.
